summary: A look at the events leading up to the Taliban's attack on Pakistani schoolgirl, Malala Yousafzai, for speaking out on girls' education followed by the aftermath, including her speech to the United Nations.
cast: Malala Yousafzai|Ziauddin Yousafzai|Toor Pekai Yousafzai|Khushal Yousafzai|Atal Yousafzai|Bono|Jon Stewart|Mobin Khan
keywords: animated segments|father daughter relationship|nobel prize winner|adolescence|survivor
title: Él me llamó Malala
